What do Korean people typically do when attending someone’s wedding?
option1: Wear a leather bracelet to show respect for the bride & grooms’ parents
option2: Prepare some cash in an envelope for the bride & groom
option3: Bring a pink rose bouquet to decorate the bride’s waiting room
option4: Never take videos when the bride enters to show respect
answer: Prepare some cash in an envelope for the bride & groom
